Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your unique needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value, I propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time only, you can acquire this exceptional product for $7500. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the significant value it brings to its users. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to experience the benefits of our product without compromising on quality. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this exclusive offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
